Description.Name: Contract for Mackie II Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with the Terran Hegemony, they have offered you a contract with one of their mechwarriors. Purchasing this contract will permit a one-time airdrop of a Hegemony Mackie II MSK-II-10H when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. After use, the contract is void and the Mackie II can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
